thread.title_full: Orlando resort offers getaway for lovebird/football fans | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Mary Thurwachter
title: Orlando resort offers getaway for lovebird/football fans | www.palmbeachpost.com
text:
If it’s fall, it’s football season. To get in on the fun, the B Resort & Spa in Orlando has a romantic getaway package for couples crazy about football.
The Gridiron Countdown package includes a king guest room, a bottle of Champagne and chocolate truffles, a romantic three-course meal at American Q, breakfast in bed and late check-out. And, while they aren’t romancing, couples can always watch their favorite football team on their in-room, flat-screen TVs.
B Resort’s American Q has an industrial, farmhouse-chic vibe and the showpiece of the restaurant is a 1950s cherry-red, Ford F1 pickup. The truck’s flatbed houses an all-you-can-eat appetizer and salad buffet. Contributed Rates start at $169 a night (two-night minimum required) and the offer is good through Nov. 30.
For reservations or more details, visit www.bhotelsandresorts.com .
